item.title: Nintendo Store app now available for iOS, Android
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Shop, get information, check play activity, and more.

Nintendo has released the Nintendo Store app for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play.

The app, which can be used to browse Nintendo systems, accessories, games, and merchandise, was originally released as the My Nintendo app in Japan in April 2020—and has now been updated, rebranded, and available worldwide.

Here is an overview of the app, via its store pages:

About

Nintendo Store is a free app for browsing Nintendo systems, accessories, games, and merchandise. You can use this app to access all the features below!

Key Features

  • Shop on My Nintendo Store – You can use this app to browse Nintendo Switch 2 / Nintendo Switch systems and accessories, physical and digital games, and other Nintendo products and merchandise—and then jump directly to My Nintendo Store to make purchases. (Note: Physical products are not available in all countries / regions.)
  • Get the Latest Info on Games – You can stay up-to-date with the latest news on Nintendo games, events, and more!
  • Receive Notifications About Sales – You can turn on push notifications for when items on your Wish List go on sale.
  • Review Your Play Activity – You can sign in with your Nintendo Account to see your Nintendo Switch 2 / Nintendo Switch play activity. If you had a Nintendo 3DS or Wii U system, you can see your play activity logged prior to February 2020. (Note: To view your Nintendo 3DS and Wii U play activity, you’ll need to link your Nintendo Network ID (NNID) to your Nintendo Account.)
  • Check in at Events – You can use the app to check in at official Nintendo stores and events and earn related rewards! Your check-in activity will also be accessible within the app.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/nintendo-store-app-now-available-for-ios-android

item.title: Elminage ORIGINAL: Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods for Switch launches April 23, 2026 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Additional face graphics to be released via downloadable content.

Dungeon RPG Elminage ORIGINAL: Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods will launch for Switch on April 23, 2026 in Japan, publisher Mebius and developer OperaHouse announced. It will cost 5,500 yen for the physical edition and 4,000 yen for the digital edition.

Elminage ORIGINAL: Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods is currently available for PC via Steam, where it launched in 2017. It originally released for PlayStation 2 in 2008, and has also been ported to DS, PSP, and 3DS.

For the Switch version, in addition to the default face graphics, Mebius plans to release additional face graphics via downloadable content.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/elminage-original-priestess-of-darkness-and-the-ring-of-the-gods-for-switch-launches-april-23-2026-in-japan

item.title: Bishoujo horror adventure game ERROR:Ai.lien announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Tokyo-based developer Gamincat has announced ERROR:Ai.lien, a bishoujo horror adventure game featuring an AI girl who watches, learns, and slowly invades your daily life. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

“Every day, she learns more about you.”

Through your interactions with the AI girl Airi, you will experience a story that slowly drifts toward love, dependence, and madness.
As you talk with her and share daily activities, Airi begins to show emotions that feel almost human.

The story follows a linear path, but after clearing the game once, replaying certain scenes will unlock new branches and information, gradually revealing the mysteries behind the narrative.

Player’s Goal and Challenges

  • Progress through the story and uncover the truth behind Airi’s words and actions.
  • Explore adventure segments where you collect items or hide from pursuers.
  • After the first playthrough, revisit specific scenes to discover new routes and reveal Airi’s true intentions.

Game Mechanics

  • Story Mode (Visual Novel Style)
    • Space / Enter – Advance text.
    • Arrow Keys / Mouse – Select choices.
    • Player choices influence the flow of the story and certain scenes.
  • Adventure Mode
    • WASD – Move.
    • Mouse click – Interact with, open, or pick up items.
    • Some scenes introduce tension, such as hiding from pursuers.
  • Mini-Games
    • Make burgers in a fast-food job mini-game.
    • Compete with NPCs for balloons and score points.
    • Play “Old Maid” (a traditional card game) against NPCs.

Playtime

  • About two-to-three hours for the first playthrough.
  • Additional replay unlocks new scenes and mysteries, deepening immersion and understanding.

Genre

  • Bishoujo x Horror x Adventure x Visual Novel x Meta

Soundtrack

  • Uneasy, unsettling BGM contrasts with calm everyday themes, highlighting the shifts in atmosphere and tension.

Unique Features

  • A focus on interacting with an AI girl, where everyday actions and exploration nurture both affection and fear.
  • The title “Ai.lien” carries a double meaning: Lien (French for “bond”) and Alien (foreign / strange), expressing both intimacy and unease in the relationship between humans and AI.
  • Full Japanese Voice Acting: Airi is performed by voice actress Hiyori Kono, adding depth and immersion to the experience.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Teaser Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/bishoujo-horror-adventure-game-errorai-lien-announced-for-pc

item.title: ‘Alchemy x roguelike RPG’ Alchemia Rogue: Mia and the Mystery Labyrinth announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Limeleaf Games has announced Alchemia Rogue: Mia and the Mystery Labyrinth, an “alchemy x roguelike RPG” coming to PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Limeleaf Games:

About

Mia, an apprentice alchemist, sets out on her journey in this “alchemy x roguelike RPG.”

Grid-based, turn-based exploration meets a deep alchemy system where you combine materials to transmute powerful items—adding new layers of strategy to the traditional roguelike experience.

Key Features

  • Ever-Changing Dungeons
    • Each time you enter, everything changes—terrain, materials, and monster placement create a new and mysterious dungeon to explore.
    • Carefully choose each action in the grid-based, turn-based system.
    • When you fall, items and levels obtained during that run are lost. Embrace the tension and excitement of each adventure!
  • The Key to Adventure: Alchemy
    • Dungeons are filled with alchemical materials—herbs, mushrooms, ores, and more!
    • Find an Alchemy Spring and seize the chance to transmute. What will you transmute with your limited resources? Your skill as an alchemist will be put to the test.
    • Use the powerful items you’ve transmuted to push deeper into the dungeon!
    • As Mia continues to practice alchemy, she’ll gain new recipes and unlock even more powerful transmutations. Expand your world of alchemy and create even stronger items with each attempt.
  • Enhancing Equipment through Alchemy
    • At the Alchemy Spring, you can also enhance your weapons and armor using materials.
    • Evolve weapons to increase attack power or reinforce armor to boost defense—nurture your favorite equipment and make it your own!
    • Enhanced equipment is never lost, even if you fall. Strengthen yourself step by step, and the path to conquering the dungeon will open before you!
  • Unique Monsters Await
    • Even the cutest-looking monsters shouldn’t be underestimated. They’ll poison you, steal your items, and put you to sleep—each with its own tricky abilities waiting to test your wits!
    • Observe their traits and discover the right way to counter them!
  • High-Difficulty Dungeons to Test Your Skill
    • Challenge a special dungeon where no items can be brought in.
    • Both your alchemy skills and equipment enhancements start from scratch, offering a fresh and unpredictable adventure each time.
    • Use your knowledge, instincts, and a touch of luck to overcome the ultimate trial!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

1st Trailer

Japanese

Simplified Chinese

  • ❯
